DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether contribute with weight loss and improvement of blood sugar and lipemia in obese women.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Probiotic and Symbiotic in Body Weight, Blood Sugar and Lipemia of Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: We will evaluate the effects of probiotic on anthropometric, laboratory, metabolomic, body and gut microbiota composition variables.
DOC.criteria: Women; Adult; Obese (BMI between 30 and 39,9 Kg/mÂ²). Pregnancy or nursing; Smokers; Drinkers; Use of drug or phytotherapic; Diagnosis of any cronic disease; Daily consumption of yogurt.
